name: Loudred
description: The Big Voice Pokémon. Loudred's bellowing can completely decimate a wood-frame house. It uses its voice to punish its foes. This Pokémon's round ears serve as loudspeakers.

abilities.name: Soundproof
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to sound-based moves.

abilities.name: Scrappy
abilities.description: This Pokémon's Normal and Fighting type moves ignore immunities granted by a Pokémon's type. If a target’s secondary type gives it vulnerability or resistance to the attack, it follows the secondary type for that effect.
